value.name: A 1921 race massacre, a 2016 police shooting: How 'transgenerational trauma' can shape Black Americans' reality
value.description: The Tulsa Race Massacre led to generations of trauma. A century after Black Wall Street's destruction, many Black Tulsans still live in fear.

value.name: For Many Black People, George Floyd's Death Has Triggered A Wave Of Trauma
value.description: Brandon Jones remembers when he first learned about the death of George Floyd. "My first reaction was numb, actually." Jones wasn't sure how to feel, he said. He was horrified. He was angry. But it didn't feel like something new.

value.name: KS Rep. Mark Samsel charged with 3 counts of battery after bizarre classroom incident
value.description: Kansas Rep. Mark Samsel is facing criminal charges for the alleged battery of two 16-year-olds last month, when a bizarre day of his substitute teaching was caught on video by high school students. Prosecutors in Franklin County charged the Wellsville Republican on Monday with three counts of misdemeanor battery against two victims.
